CustomField.formula: "I confirm that I have not been paid a care leavers bursary before and would like to receive a bursary as a care leaver. I understand that if I am found to have accepted this payment incorrectly, or that I become ineligible, then this bursary needs to be repaid:" + BR() + BR() + IF( Would_like_to_receive_bursary__c = true, 'Yes', 'No' )
CustomField.label: Would like to receive bursary
